description: haven:  Import and Export 'SPSS', 'Stata' and 'SAS' Files\n\nImport foreign statistical formats into R via the embedded 'ReadStat' C library, <https://github.

vulnerabilities.title: [CVE-2018-11364] CWE-772: Missing Release of Resource after Effective Lifetime
vulnerabilities.description: sav_parse_machine_integer_info_record in spss/readstat_sav_read.c in libreadstat.a in ReadStat 0.1.1 has a memory leak related to an iconv_open call.

vulnerabilities.title: [CVE-2018-11365] CWE-835: Loop with Unreachable Exit Condition ('Infinite Loop')
vulnerabilities.description: sas/readstat_sas7bcat_read.c in libreadstat.a in ReadStat 0.1.1 has an infinite loop.

vulnerabilities.title: [CVE-2018-5698] CWE-125: Out-of-bounds Read
vulnerabilities.description: libreadstat.a in WizardMac ReadStat 0.1.1 has a heap-based buffer over-read via an unterminated string.
